sentences.en: A young English botanist named Charles Darwin, the author of the theory of evolution, was the first European to see alerces, with trunks that had a circumference of 130 feet.
sentences.cn: 进化论的作者、年轻的英国植物学家查尔斯·达尔文，是第一个看到落叶柏树干圆周长达一百三十英尺的欧洲人。

sentences.en: What the botanist tells us after a number of imperfect lectures, the flower proclaimed in a minute.
sentences.cn: 植物学家需要开几次不完美讲座之后才能告诉我们的事情，花在一分钟内就告诉我们了。
亨里是英国的植物学家。
